content: amalia is a 12 30 5 cm textured granny square it was designed for the 2025 moogly crochet along this pattern is part of the third edition of granny square month 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch treble triple crochet crocheting in rounds increasing crocheting in chain spaces includes video tutorial crocheting in the back loop includes link to video tutorial special stitch patterns cluster fpdc puff includes written instructions and video tutorials in pattern **skill level** easy **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 40 yd 36 5 m in ca 66 yd 60 5 m in cb and 90 yd 82 5 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle **gauge** motif = 12 30 5 cm square in pattern *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern* 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/01/granny-square-month-is-back/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/06/26/amalia-granny-square-crochet-pattern/
